item.title: Donald Trump's Oval Office Address
item.description: President Donald Trump's Oval Office address on the assassination of Charlie Kirk.

item.title: Hegseth Recites Lord's Prayer With Troops After Kirk Death
item.description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth recited the Lord's Prayer with troops following the assassination of Turning Point USA co-founder and CEO Charlie Kirk ...

item.title: House Speaker Warns of Heightened Security Concerns
item.description: House Speaker Mike Johnson, R-La., said lawmakers are facing a "deluge" of security concerns in the wake of Charlie Kirk's assassination, telling CNN ...

item.title: Melania Mourns Kirk's Legacy of 'Family, Love, and Country'
item.description: First lady Melania Trump shared a somber message on social media following the reported death of conservative activist Charlie Kirk.
